document_data.name: Curse of Ill Fortune
document_data.mainbody: '''''Curse of ill fortune''''' was a [[spell]] used by [[cleric]]s of [[Beshaba]].
document_data.Effects: When cast, this spell temporarily cursed a targeted creature. The curse generally weakened the target. The curse could be lifted by any spell that also removed ''[[bestow curse]]''.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, the spell required a [[divine focus]].
